title: The Depths
desc:
Post 1799
- Whenever someone other than you plays a card on this, they get inflicted by **Gloom** 1, unless it's one of the cards that decrease it.
- If you play a card on this, you may choose a card in your hand to add the <:gloom:1187518684143550605> color to, as long as it doesn't have a color that normally decreases **Gloom**.
